dancing_butterfly.name: Dancing Butterfly
dancing_butterfly.description: This spinner starts its performance with a beautiful spray fountain, then surprisingly finishes with a barrage of six jumping red and green baby ground bloom spinners.

saturn_ring_eruption.name: Saturn Ring Eruption
saturn_ring_eruption.description: Saturn shape spinner with silver ring and crackling finale.

triple_whistler.name: Triple Whistler
triple_whistler.description: Three-stage whistling bottle rocket with report. You will love this one!

four_horseman_rocket.name: Four Horseman Rocket
four_horseman_rocket.description: This one flies fast and high! Powerful aerial action has excellent lift and super-charged colorful burst.

wolfpack_missle_base.name: Wolfpack Missle Base
wolfpack_missle_base.description: Five effects: fiery tail, crackle, color burst, silver glitter, yellow peony.

crackling_ball.name: Crackling Ball
crackling_ball.description: Round firecracker-type ball with crackling and flashing effects.

wolfpack_snaps.name: Wolfpack Snaps
wolfpack_snaps.description: Kids favorite trick noisemaker. 200 snaps per box.

tank_w/r.name: Tank W/R
tank_w/r.description: Combat simulation. This tank has wheels and moves in a forward motion shooting sparks and bombs. Lots of fun!
